snippet.title: Night Shift: Laundry - Official Horror Indie Game Trailer (Indonesia)
snippet.description:
Step into the haunting unknown with Night Shift: Laundry, the debut indie horror game by Bite X Studios. What starts as a routine late-night shift at an old laundromat quickly spirals into a chilling nightmare. Shadows move where they shouldn’t. Strange whispers echo through the empty halls. And something… is watching. 

Release Date: November 30, 2024 
at https://bitexstudios.itch.io/

Are you ready to uncover the dark secrets hidden within the laundromat? Watch the official trailer and prepare for a shift you’ll never forget.

The night won’t be silent… Will you survive it?
#NightShiftLaundry #BiteXStudios #HorrorIndieGame #Indonesia
